hibernate-mapping.query: select pt from ProcedureType pt where pt in ( select elements(relevanceGroup.ProcedureTypes) from RelevanceGroup relevanceGroup where ? in elements(relevanceGroup.ProcedureTypes) )

select priorReport, priorProcedure, priorProcType, priorOrder from Order priorOrder join priorOrder.Procedures priorProcedure left join priorProcedure.Type priorProcType join priorProcedure.Reports priorReport where priorReport.Status not in ('X') and priorOrder.Patient = ?
